title: Remover
introduction: Magic Remover is a background remover and AI background changer tool that allows users to remove unwanted elements from images for free. It offers features like erasing repeatedly for better performance and creating images using text. The tool is designed to help users make their products stand out and impress their audience by removing distractions.

faqs.question: Is there a size limit when uploading an image to Remover?
faqs.answer: There is no mention of a size limit for uploading images to Remover.

faqs.answer: There is no specific limit mentioned for the number of images that can be edited.

faqs.answer: There is no information provided about image storage on Remover.

faqs.answer: The text suggests erasing repeatedly for better performance.

faqs.answer: The tool likely provides a feature to remove unwanted objects from photos, but specific instructions are not provided in the text.
